abstract: The future of BP’s trading unit is uncertain as oil spill costs mount and rival firms try to lure away traders.
snippet: The future of BP’s trading unit is uncertain as oil spill costs mount and rival firms try to lure away traders.
lead_paragraph: It seems like Wall Street at its worst: a cowboy on the trading floor plots to corner a market, and gets caught.

headline.main: BP Loses Trading-Floor Swagger in Energy Markets
